mapper.select: select p1.plate_id plateId, p1.plate_name plateName, p1.img_url imgUrl, p1.create_by createBy, p1.create_time createTime, p1.remark, ifnull(p1.postInPlate,0) postInPlate,ifnull(p2.postInPlateByToday,0) postInPlateByToday from (select p.plate_id, p.plate_name, p.img_url, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.remark,count(p2.post_id) postInPlate from plate p left join post p2 on p.plate_id = p2.plate_id where p.status = '0' and p2.status = '0' group by p.plate_id) p1 left join (select p1.plate_id, count(p2.post_id) postInPlateByToday from plate p1 left join post p2 on p1.plate_id = p2.plate_id where p1.status = '0' and p2.status = '0' and DATEDIFF(p2.create_time,NOW())=0 group by p1.plate_id) p2 on p1.plate_id = p2.plate_id order by p1.create_time desc

select pl.plate_id plateId,pl.plate_name plateName,sum(p.heat_degree) heatDegree from plate pl left join post p on pl.plate_id = p.plate_id where p.status = '0' and pl.status = '0' group by pl.plate_id order by sum(p.heat_degree) desc limit 0,5
